Text.Language: Taisour/ n~noub n~kayaroc etfai qa pia~rwmata etqen nenjij n~Aa~rwn piou/b eftale ouc~yoinoufi e~p~swi e~jen piman~erswousi.
This censer of pure gold, bearing the aroma, is in the hands of Aaron the priest, offering up incense upon the altar.
